metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14303 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the AD DC NBT server in all Samba versions before 4.10.17, before 4.11.11 and before 4.12.4. A samba user could send an empty UDP packet to cause the samba server to crash.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14303` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
libnss-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
libpam-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
libparse-pidl-perl - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
libsmbclient - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
libwbclient0 - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
python-samba - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
registry-tools - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
samba - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
samba-common - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
samba-common-bin - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
samba-libs - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
samba-testsuite - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
smbclient - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.16.04.29').
